<h1>The Farnsworth Parabox</h1>
<p>And yet you haven't said what I told you to say! How can any of us trust you? Shut up and get to the point! Why am I sticky and naked? Did I miss something fun? Who am I making this out to? Is that a cooking show?</p>
<h2>Parasites Lost</h2>
<p>Why would I want to know that? And yet you haven't said what I told you to say! How can any of us trust you? We need rest.  The spirit is willing, but the flesh is spongy and bruised. That could be 'my' beautiful soul sitting naked on a couch. If I could just learn to play this stupid thing. Guards! Bring me the forms I need to fill out to have her taken away! Now that the, uh, garbage ball is in space, Doctor, perhaps you can help me with my sexual inhibitions?</p>
<ul>
<li>For example, if you killed your grandfather, you'd cease to exist!</li>
<li>Goodbye, cruel world. Goodbye, cruel lamp. Goodbye, cruel velvet drapes, lined with what would appear to be some sort of cruel muslin and the cute little pom-pom curtain pull cords. Cruel though they may be&hellip;</li>
<li>I love this planet! I've got wealth, fame, and access to the depths of sleaze that those things bring.</li>
<li>Daylight and everything.</li>
</ul>
<h3>Hell Is Other Robots</h3>
<p>You won't have time for sleeping, soldier, not with all the bed making you'll be doing. Yes. You gave me a dollar and some candy. One hundred dollars. Soon enough. Yes. You gave me a dollar and some candy.</p>
<h4>That Darn Katz!</h4>
<p>Ooh, name it after me! Then we'll go with that data file! I love this planet! I've got wealth, fame, and access to the depths of sleaze that those things bring. You're going back for the Countess, aren't you? Fry, we have a crate to deliver.</p>
<ol>
<li>I feel like I was mauled by Jesus.</li>
<li>Why would I want to know that?</li>
</ol>
<h5>A Leela of Her Own</h5>
<p>We're rescuing ya. Tell her you just want to talk. It has nothing to do with mating. I'm just glad my fat, ugly mama isn't alive to see this day.</p>
